thread.title: Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged
thread.title_full: Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged

title: Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged
text:
Updated: 5:24 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015 | Posted: 5:24 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015 Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged Sponsored Links LONDON â€” 
British Olympic diver Tom Daley and Oscar-winning screenwriter Dustin Lance Black have announced their engagement. 
The announcement was published in The Times newspaper Thursday, but did not disclose a date for the marriage. 
Black is a writer and producer who won an Academy Award for his screenplay for the 2008 movie "Milk" about gay activist and politician Harvey Milk. 
Daley won a bronze medal at the 2012 Olympics in London and his youthful exuberance made him a fan favorite. 
He came out as a gay man in a YouTube video nearly two years ago, announcing that he was dating a man and couldn't be happier. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WHIO-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
